calculations.name: Term Label CAD Formatting
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [TERM_LABEL]="3 Month" or  [TERM_LABEL]="3M Cash" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX2" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX1"   or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX3" then 1
ELSEIF  [TERM_LABEL] ="BAX5"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX4" or [TERM_LABEL]="BAX6"   then 2
ELSEIF  [TERM_LABEL] ="BAX9"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX10" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX7" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX8" then 3
else 4 end

calculation_context.Expression:
if [TERM_LABEL]="3 Month" or  [TERM_LABEL]="3M Cash" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX2" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX1"   or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX3" then 1
ELSEIF  [TERM_LABEL] ="BAX5"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX4" or [TERM_LABEL]="BAX6"   then 2
ELSEIF  [TERM_LABEL] ="BAX9"  or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX10" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX7" or [TERM_LABEL]= "BAX8" then 3
else 4 end
